951410.name: The Tale of Greenbrier
951410.description: In this action platformer, follow the journey of Genevieve Goldenglow, a mouse who sets off on an adventure to save her village from destruction by an encroaching corruption. Set in a large continuous 2.5D fantasy world, Genevieve will encounter twisted, deadly creatures, learn ancient arcane knowledge and new abilities, solve puzzles that block the way, and fight monstrous bosses on her journey to heal the forest and save the village.
951410.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
